title: Karisma Kapoor
summary: Karisma Kapoor (born 25 June 1974) is an Indian film actress, who works in Hindi films. Born and raised in Mumbai, she is a member of the Kapoor family, and made her acting debut with the film Prem Qaidi in 1991. She is the recipient of several accolades, including a National Film Award and four Filmfare Awards.
